main event: A bright white object with a fuzzy front and tapering tail was observed moving from East to West before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 6 October 1959 at 2030 hours,The object was observed for 1 minute,The object moved in a westward direction and disappeared by burning out,It was described as having characteristics similar to a meteor,The report suggests the sky conditions were civilian.
sighted object: bright white object with a fuzzy front and tapering tail
witness description: No witnesses were mentioned in the report.
